overview: At the center of the newest Nashville scandal, Dixie is the young performer who wrote the hottest song of the year. Famous pop star Missy Free wants to record it. Music label execs want to steal it. And Dixie just wants to sing. Filled with a rocking soundtrack & steamy action, Love, Sex & Music gets down in the groove!
tagline: It's a long hard road to the top of the charts.
title: Love, Sex & Music
